name: .TC2 File Extension
summary: Learn about .TC2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Two-dimensional drawing created by the Mac version of TurboCAD, a CAD program used for drafting mechanical and architectural designs; stores drawn shapes, styles, text, and other graphics; commonly used for drafting building floor plans.

content: Three-dimensional designs created in TurboCAD are stored with the .TC3 extension.
NOTE: TC2 files are only supported by the Mac version of TurboCAD.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
